description:
One rainy day after school, both Nozaki and Chiyo forget their umbrellas and decide to try out a solution used in shojo manga... and using a jacket as cover... but they quickly realize that doesn`t work, and rush back. Despite being drenched, Nozaki still tries to think of other solutions to this problem that he can think of from shojo mangas and...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ドキドキ, たりてる?
